short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Export DNS entries for domains registered with Name.com

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Name.com do not provide a way to export DNS zones, so this extension adds it! DNS zones are exported using the standard BIND9 syntax, and the resulting export file can be imported into any DNS host.

This extension is open source! Bug reports and pull requests are appreciated -
 Please send them to the GitHub repo at https://github.com/Daniel15/namedotcom-export
